Module Configuration.Name: Population Size
Module Configuration.Description: Specifies the number of samples drawn from the posterior distribution at each generation.

Module Configuration.Name: Max Chain Length
Module Configuration.Description: Chains longer than Max Chain Length will be broken and samples will be duplicated (replacing samples associated with a chain length of 0).

Module Configuration.Name: Default Burn In
Module Configuration.Description: Specifies the number of additional TMCMC steps per chain per generation.

Module Configuration.Name: Burn In Steps
Module Configuration.Description: Specifies the number of additional TMCMC steps per chain at specified generations.

Module Configuration.Name: Target Coefficient of Variation
Module Configuration.Description: Initial value for the target coefficient of variation to search for the exponent $ho_{i+1}$. By default, Korali will set this value to 1.00 as suggested in [Ching2007].

Module Configuration.Name: Covariance Scaling
Module Configuration.Description: Covariance scaling factor $ eta^2$ of proposal distribution. By default, Korali sets this value 0.04 as suggested in [Ching2007].

Module Configuration.Name: Use Local Covariance
Module Configuration.Description: If $true, TMCMC calculates a local covariance matrix per sample from its neighbours.

Module Configuration.Name: Min Rho Update
Module Configuration.Description: Minimum increment of the exponent $ho_{i+1}$. This parameter prevents TMCMC from stalling.

Module Configuration.Name: Max Rho Update
Module Configuration.Description: Maximum increment of the exponent $ho{i+1}$. By default, Korali will set this value to 1.0 (inactive).

Internal Settings.Name: Current Burn In
Internal Settings.Description: Actual placeholder for burn in steps per generation, calculated from $Burn In Default$, $Burn In Steps$ and current generation.

Internal Settings.Name: Chain Pending Fitness
Internal Settings.Description: Indicates that the fitness result for the chain is pending.

Internal Settings.Name: Chain Candidate Parameters
Internal Settings.Description: Current (theta) parameters of the chain leader sample.

Internal Settings.Name: Chain Candidates LogLikelihoods
Internal Settings.Description: The logLikelihoods of the chain candidates.

Internal Settings.Name: Chain Leader Parameters
Internal Settings.Description: Current (theta) parameters of the chain leader sample.

Internal Settings.Name: Chain Leaders LogLikelihoods
Internal Settings.Description: The logLikelihoods of the chain leaders.

Internal Settings.Name: Finished Chains Count
Internal Settings.Description: Number of finished chains.

Internal Settings.Name: Current Chain Step
Internal Settings.Description: The current execution step for every chain.

Internal Settings.Name: Chain Lengths
Internal Settings.Description: Length for each of the chains.

Internal Settings.Name: Coefficient Of Variation
Internal Settings.Description: Current coefficient of variation.

Internal Settings.Name: Chain Count
Internal Settings.Description: Unique selections after resampling (forming new chain).

Internal Settings.Name: Annealing Exponent
Internal Settings.Description: how the calculated distribution fits the real distribution

Internal Settings.Name: Accepted Samples Count
Internal Settings.Description: Accepted samples after proposal.

Internal Settings.Name: LogEvidence
Internal Settings.Description: Calculated logEvidence of the model so far.

Internal Settings.Name: Proposals Acceptance Rate
Internal Settings.Description: Acceptance rate calculated from samples.

Internal Settings.Name: Selection Acceptance Rate
Internal Settings.Description: Acceptance rate calculated from chain count.

Internal Settings.Name: Covariance Matrix
Internal Settings.Description: Sample covariance of leader fitness values.

Internal Settings.Name: Mean Theta
Internal Settings.Description: Mean of leader fitness values.

Internal Settings.Name: Database Entry Count
Internal Settings.Description: Number of accepted samples stored in the database.

Internal Settings.Name: Sample Parameters Database
Internal Settings.Description: Variable values of samples stored in the database.

Internal Settings.Name: Sample Fitness Database
Internal Settings.Description: Fitness of the samples stored in the database.

Internal Settings.Name: Local Covariance Matrices
Internal Settings.Description: Local covariances of chain leaders.
